sentences.sContent: It allows nicotine to diffuse slowly and steadily into the bloodstream.
sentences.sCn: 它使尼古丁缓慢、稳步地扩散到血液当中。

phrases.pCn: 漫反射率；漫反射系数；护散反射率

remMethod.val: dif(分开) + fus(流) + e → 分流 → 传播； 漫射

trans.tranOther: To diffuse or be diffused through something means to move and spread through it
